Description.content: Set the absolute path to the OpenCms installations base directory, i.e., {absolute path to the webapp home}/WEB-INF. If not provided, the path is read from the system property user.dir. The start scripts set this argument automatically.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content:
Provide the path to a OpenCms shell script file. Such a file lists a series of OpenCms shell commands. The commands are all executed when handing the script to shell on startup.

The last command in your OpenCms shell script should be quit or exit, because mixing batch mode and interactive mode is not supported.

Description.content: The servlet mapping defined in the web.xml of the OpenCms installation. If not given /opencms/* is used as default.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The webapp name of the default webapp as configured for your servlet container. The default value is ROOT, as it is in a standard Tomcat installation.
